intro_only_event_typebattle_2024/6901_10:
Chuck, I hear you like to do physical training
alongside your Pokémon.

I suppose training my body doesn’t really make me
any stronger at Pokémon battling, though!
Well, I can’t say it’s completely unrelated.

Training alongside your Pokémon means you’re
building a stronger bond with them...

In other words, it could be an optimal way to
strengthen your teamwork as a sync pair!
You might have a point there...

Then let’s hop right into a battle with some of
Pasio's sync pairs!

I’ll be watching... As you’re a seasoned fighter,
I’d like to see if your theories on how to raise
Pokémon turn out to be correct.
intro_only_event_typebattle_2024/6801_10:
Please tell me if you know any cute, energetic
Fire-type Pokémon!

If we were in Galar, I suppose I’d recommend
Scorbunny.
I’m a fan of Litleo, myself.

It’s not just cute—it’s a very reliable partner
in battle, as well.
intro_only_event_typebattle_2024/6802_10:
If I ever get my hands on some Sootfoot Root, I’d
like to try cooking up some potato mochi!

It’s really easy to lose track of how much you’ve
had, so be careful!

No problem! If that happens, I can just dance as
post-snack exercise!
intro_only_event_typebattle_2024/6803_10:
I’m going to train 24 hours
a day!

I have to warn you that I’m pretty strong! I spend
a lot of time every day training under a pounding
waterfall!

You really do look strong! I bet you could battle
a Pokémon yourself!

I think it’s great to keep your body healthy, but I
don’t know about actually fighting a Pokémon...
intro_only_event_typebattle_2024/6804_10:
I give you my word I’ll become a Dragon-type
Gym Leader!

As long as you love Dragon-type Pokémon, I’m
sure it’ll happen!

Go forth, Ryuki! Go on to your next challenge
with your head held high!
intro_only_event_typebattle_2024/6805_10:
It’s really fun to see your Pokédex fill up with
more and more entries!

I can kind of understand what people mean when
they talk about having a “collector’s spirit”...

Wanting to obtain and collect rarities is human
nature!
intro_only_event_typebattle_2024/6806_10:
Everyone gets to do what
they’re best at!

The Aether Foundation has been taking care of
some lost Pokémon...

Thank you, Noland, for taking in the ones
that liked to battle and training them as
rental Pokémon. It’s been a great help.

I’m having fun, too, since it means I get to train
all kinds of Pokémon!

Both the Pokémon AND Noland seem really happy
with that arrangement! It’s fantastic! Just fantastic!
intro_only_event_typebattle_2024/6807_10: You really are a strong one, Rika!
We’ll be waiting for you at the Battle Maison!

Pardon, but I must insist that you visit the Battle
Subway, Rika!
Hey, hey! Stop fighting over good ol’ Rika!
intro_only_event_typebattle_2024/6808_10:
I’m not so great at games
that require thinking...

I finally solved a puzzle that I bought the other
day!

Wow! I’ve never been able to finish a puzzle
before!

Yeah, those things take a lot of time, so I’m not
great at them, either...
intro_only_event_typebattle_2024/6809_10:
Zap! Rock, paper, pew
pew pew!

If there was an electric Pokémon influencer, it’d
have to be Pikachu, RIGHT?!
But Alolan Raichu is really popular, too!
My partner Pikachu’s the best of them all!
intro_only_event_typebattle_2024/6810_10: What exactly does an “Ice-type Gym Leader” do?

I suppose it involves a good amount of rigorous
training in extremely cold environments.

In Paldea, Geeta comes around to assess us on a
regular basis.

She always says it’s just a formality, but the
pressure behind it is the real deal. It can freeze
you up good.

Pressure, huh? I wonder if I have enough might
to endure that!
intro_only_event_typebattle_2024/6811_10:
Hee hee, I sure hope I can count on you both to
recommend me for promotion to the major division
in the Galar League!

I wouldn’t mind, but first, I need to see if you
have the talent befitting that position!

I'm afraid the League doesn’t allow shortcuts when
it comes to promotions to the major division.
intro_only_event_typebattle_2024/6812_10:
Professor, I heard you research Pokémon moves by
having them used on you. Is that true?

Yeah! It’s the best way to experience how your
Pokémon has grown.
You gotta just feel it with your own body!

I suppose that’s one way to build combinations
of people and Pokémon...
intro_only_event_typebattle_2024/6813_10:
My heart feels at ease when I’m with Slowpoke...
It’s psychic healing!

I wanna learn from their laid back, unfazed
personalities!

I love Slowpoke, too! Somehow, I can relate to
them...
intro_only_event_typebattle_2024/6814_10: Agatha, do you like to tell scary stories?

I’d love to hear one from a Ghost-type Trainer as
experienced as you!

Sorry to disappoint, child, but I don’t have any
ghost stories to tell...

The scariest story I know is how I’ve gotten so old
in the blink of an eye.
intro_only_event_typebattle_2024/6815_10: Johto has a Battle Frontier too!

I passed by it once when I was chasing after
Suicune!

I wonder what happened to that man who was
trying to be first in line for the grand opening?
intro_only_event_typebattle_2024/6816_10:
Mr. Rose, how come your Copperajah and my
Rajah look so different sometimes?

That’s because mine can Gigantamax! That, of
course, is a special subset of the Dynamax
phenomenon found in the Galar region!
Thank you very much for teaching me that!
What a sweet, well-mannered child you are!
intro_only_event_typebattle_2024/6817_10:
Bird Pokémon are so cool! The glint of their eyes,
their beaks...

Indeed, I must agree. They are also reliable and
relatively easy to get along with, being so
abundant and familiar...

Bird Pokémon are favored by of the winds of
victory... You seem to understand their
appeal.
intro_only_event_typebattle_2024/6818_10: I hear your Eevee’s a little different from most.

Yup yup! She can use Secret Techniques and
doesn’t like to stay in her Poké Ball...

(As a fellow Normal-type user, I’m intrigued,
but a Pokémon like that might be too exciting for
an average guy like me...)
